title: Calculator Refactor - Modular Design & Method Organization
description: Refactor a working calculator application from monolithic code into well-organized methods. Learn code organization, method extraction, code reuse, and building a menu-driven application. Transform imperative code into modular, maintainable software.
learningObjectives: Learn to extract methods from monolithic code
Practice creating reusable methods for operations
Build a validation method for input handling
Design a menu system using methods
Transform procedural code into modular design
